frameset.edef: to admit, recognize, acknowledge or confess

example.parse:
(VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اعترف) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP شيف)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (NP-TPC-1 (PRON_3FS ها)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS تضمنت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC تجميعاً) (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC دقيقاً)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مواقف) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_GEN الطرفين)))
(PUNC .))

arg.g: that it includes a thorough collection of different issues regarding both sides' views

example.parse: (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_NOM كثير)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN علماء) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الدين))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الايرانيين))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP اعترفوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أن) (S (NP-TPC-2 (PRON_3MP هم)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP أخطأوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC عند) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MP تولوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC المناصب) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC الرسمية))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: that the initial meeting hadn't reached any positive results

example.arg: بأنهم أخطأوا عندما تولوا المناصب الرسمية

example.parse: (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM القرار) (NOUN_NUM 194)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM الصادر) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مجلس) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الامن) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الدولي)))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اعترف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN لفلسطينيين))) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حق) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN العودة))))))) (PUNC ")))) (PUNC .))
